title: First week at PESU
content: Can someone tell me the first week rituals (wrt bsc psychology)

comments.body: You'll be having bootstrap, idk how it is for psych students but it's basically an introductory session where u will be doing some interesting activities that aren't rlly academic.
Are we allowed to take digital notes in class? Do we need a lot of textbooks or will they provide pdfs for everything?
Mostly u won't be allowed to take digital notes. Notes will be available on pesuacademy but do try to read parts of textbook they recommend. Try to get the pdf of the textbooks if u cannot afford.
